title: Cloud Gaming Is Looking More Attractive Than Ever for All the Wrong Reasons
description: With prices for PC parts skyrocketing, maybe streaming your games isn't so bad... if you can stomach the subscription.
content: I had a plan. I was going to build my own version of Valves Steam Machine using traditional PC parts, then stuff it all into my childhood PC case installed with SteamOS for the ultimate combination o… [+5980 chars]
